INFORMATION

It had been his dream for years but Vincent had failed to take any action toward making it come true. There had always been a good excuse to delay or prioritize another project. As he woke, he realized he was once again at a crossroads. Would it be another excuse or would he finally find the courage to pursue his dream? Vincent rose and took her first step to pass Computer Science.
